doc.after: There are at least two senses in which the term philosophy is used In the more formal sense philosophy is an intellectual endeavor focusing on the fields of metaphysics logic ethics epistemology and aesthetics In the more informal sense philosophy is a way of life whose focus is resolving the existential questions about the human condition Philosophy is distinguished from other ways of addressing these questions such as mysticism or mythology by its critical generally systematic approach and its reliance on reasoned argument
